fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 lost 67.80 points or 0.36% to settle at 18,688.10. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, fell 0.73% to 11.08. HDFC Bank, Reliance Industries (RIL) and ICICI Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The June 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 29 June 2023.
